reviewText:
This movie is a documentary following a hand full of Cosplayers at the Euro cosplay event at MCM expo london
The movie was made to inspire and promote the cosplayers and the amazing event
this is the 1st British Cosplay feature film which was shot over 48 hours around one event as it starts and ends
following how the Cosplayers create their costumes and why they do it i a positive light
Please leave your reviews of this movie
